mapper.select: select emp_name, rank_title, job_title, emp_id, dept_title from employee e join rank r on e.rank_code=r.rank_code join job j on e.job_code=j.job_code join department d on e.dept_code=d.dept_code where resign_flag='N' and r.rank_Code is not null and extract (year from e.hire_date) <= #{year} order by emp_name

select emp_name, rank_title, job_title, emp_id, dept_title, e.hire_date from employee e join rank r on e.rank_code=r.rank_code join job j on e.job_code=j.job_code join department d on e.dept_code=d.dept_code where resign_flag='N' and r.rank_Code is not null and extract (year from e.hire_date) <= #{year}
and e.dept_code='D0'
and e.dept_code='D1'
and e.dept_code='D2'
and e.dept_code='D3'
and e.dept_code='D4'
and e.dept_code='D5'
order by emp_name

select h.hday, h.useday, h.remain_day, uh.holiday_usecount, uh.holiday_start, uh.holiday_end, ht.holiday_type, emp_name, rank_title, dept_title from holiday h join use_holiday uh using (emp_id) join holiday_type ht using (holiday_typecode) join employee e using(emp_id) join department d on(e.dept_code=d.dept_code) join rank r on(e.rank_code=r.rank_code) where emp_id=#{empId} and SUBSTR(holiday_start,1,4)=#{year}

select e.emp_name, r.rank_title, d.dept_title, hday, remain_day from holiday join employee e using (emp_id) join rank r on e.rank_code=r.rank_code join department d on(e.dept_code=d.dept_code) where emp_id = #{empId} and year = #{year}
select us.*, ht.* from use_holiday us, HOLIDAY_TYPE ht where us.holiday_typecode=ht.holiday_typecode
mapper.update: update Work_Record set CLOCK_OUT=#{clockOut} where EMP_ID=#{empId} and clock_out is null
